nodes.bodyText: Can you ensure there is a space before & after all the operators?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@ +
+
+ Definition of Terms +
+

CV: current value
+ PV: previous (baseline) value
+ SUM_CV: total value
+ SUM_PV: total previous (baseline) value +

+
+ Formulas +
+

Percentage Change: (CV -PV) * 100 / PV
+ Change in Contribution: (CV/SUM_CV -PV/ SUM_PV) * 100
+ Contribution to Overall Change: (CV -PV) * 100 / (SUM_CV-SUM_PV)

nodes.bodyText:
Is it possible to put this question sign next to

"Color heatmap by" when the user selects the heatmap tab and
At the end of the cell "Contribution to Overall Change" and "Change in Contribution?" when in the Algorithm tab.
Thanks.
